verbs.description: WASHINGTON -- The US and North Korea [V: have] settled on a venue for the summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , White House press secretary Sarah Sanders said Tuesday .

WASHINGTON -- [ARG0: The US and North Korea] have [V: settled] [ARG1: on a venue for the summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , White House press secretary Sarah Sanders said Tuesday .

[ARG1: WASHINGTON -- The US and North Korea have settled on a venue for the summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , [ARG0: White House press secretary Sarah Sanders] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] .
